tweet: The Seas are ready for some smooth sailing if only we had money for that boat.
There's a time and place for everything under the sun but too often our credit keeps us in the shade.
Lowering expectations reveals very little especially if our sight is too high.
Every action taken, receives an equal and opposite reaction, especially when it comes to spending and paying.
